Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 71st/Central Park
ShortDescription: #67 buses are temporarily rerouted via 76th, Pulaski, Marquette, Kedzie, and 71st, due to defective railroad gates near 71st/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/87th
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 87th, Vincennes, 95th and Ashland due to police activity near Ashland/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 87th, Vincennes, 95th and Ashland due to police activity near Ashland/87th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
